The most inconvenient thing is taking it 30 minutes after the same meal each day but I understand why. NOT doing that will increase the concentration in your bloodstream much quicker and can lead to serious side effects. I had also been suffering with ED. She prescribed 25 mg sildenafil as needed with a STERN warning to avoid taking the two less than 4 hours apart. I'm also on 100-25 mg of Losartan-HCTZ so the last thing I need is a sudden drop in BP! Worst side effect so far is thin and almost clear semen. Libido is lower overall, but that's OK. Still some ED as well.
